Articles.Content:
KSP: .90 32 bit

Problem: game is locked up, been running this setup fine for awhile now, today its inexplicably stuck. One of the mods I'm using is Kerbal Construction Time and anytime I try to launch a vehicle clicking launch doesn't do anything. The only buildings that do anything when clicked are the runway, launchpad, and astronaut complex, but they don't do anything besides open their respective menus.

Mods Installed: B9 Aerospace

Community Tech Tree

Cross Feed Enabler

Deadly Reentry

Docking Port Alignment

Enhanced NavBall

FAR

Flight Manager for Reusable Stages

Interstellar

KAS

Kerbal Construction Time

Kerbal Alarm Clock

kOS

KSPI Extended Configuration

KW Rocketry

Infernal Robotics

Mechjeb

RealChute

Regolith

RemoteTech

SafeChute

Stage Recovery

Station Science

Tac Fuel Balancer

Tac Life Support

Tech Manager

Tweakscale

Warp Drive

All mods are up to date

Reproduction steps: .... play the game for awhile I guess? I haven't changed anything recently, nothing obviously triggered it, just wouldn't work when I booted the game up.

EDIT: also loading up other save games with the exact same mods installed work just fine, it appears to be just the one save that's having issues.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T03:42:51Z" title="04/20/2015 03:42  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by Tunnel\_Snake**
Did you change any mods, this is common when mods get changed, it corrupts the save file.
